In 1976 Shaw's granddaughter, poet Alice Judson Hayes (1922â€“2006), founded The Ragdale Foundation as a non-profit aimed at providing a place of rest and relaxation for artists of all disciplines. .... The Foundation currently hosts artists from a number of disciplines: nonfiction- and fiction-writers, composers, poets, play-and screen-writers, visual artists, choreographers, as well as those from interdisciplinary interests. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ragdale [work]
